thread.section_title: 1st Art-gallery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of 1st Art-gallery | www.1st-art-gallery.com
thread.title: Pamela Boyd

author: Pamela Boyd
title: Pamela Boyd
text: I couldn't be happier with my purchase from 1st art gallery. There was an extensive selection of art works from which to choose. Once you make your choice, 1st art gallery assigns an artist to paint your reproduction.They provided the piece in the time frame given. What was really excellent was the communication. Once my piece was completed, they contacted me with a photo of the finished product to ensure that I was happy with the painting before framing and shipping.They were also very accommodating. I was worried that the delivery would come while I was away from home traveling, so they adjusted my delivery location.
